name: Sunnyland
description: All looks fun, but beware of the slowly approaching black void as it approaches to swallow you. Quick! cruise through the levels swiftly so that the void, the water, or even pure nothingness cannot consume you. Every second wasted can be a matter of life and death as the evil crams you up. As you run out of space, it gets harder to finish this game and earn the trophy at the end!
